text: aur tum soory ko dekhoge ki jab nikalata hai, to unakee goopha se daayen jhuk jaata hai aur jab doobata hai, to unase baayen katara jaata hai aur ve us (gupha) ke ek vistrt sthaan mein hain. ye allaah kee nishaaniyon mein se hai aur jise allaah maarg dikha de, vahee supath paane vaala hai aur jise kupath kar de, to tum kadaapi usake lie koee sahaayak maargadarshak nahin paoge
